user_query: I want to optimize my personal blog for better search engine rankings. Can you analyze the keyword density and provide recommendations for the top keywords and phrases? Additionally, fetch the sitemap XML for my blog and convert it into JSON format.

TaskList.description: Analyze the current content of the personal blog to determine the keyword density for various keywords and phrases.
Provide recommendations for the top keywords and phrases based on the analysis of keyword density.
Fetch the sitemap XML for the personal blog to retrieve its structure and pages.
Convert the retrieved sitemap XML data into JSON format for easier manipulation and understanding.
